content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x3)
- Inserter (position x4) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position x5) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position x3

### Copper Plate Mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x6) and a furnace at position(y1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure that you have enough required resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft Iron Gear Wheel, you need 2 iron-plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when trying to craft items without the necessary crafting machine
- Verify that you have the appropriate crafting machine or furnace available for the item you are trying to craft.
